ai-tha-ap144:1.3_0: I bannered the upwards of the posts,
ai-tha-ap144:1.4_0: sprinkled the Buddha at the Shrine.
ai-tha-ap144:2.1_0: The army having fallen from Māra’s army,
ai-tha-ap144:2.4_0: I cry out at the very moment.
ai-tha-ap144:3.1_0: Oh, the Buddhas! Oh, the Dhammas!
ai-tha-ap144:3.2_0: Oh, the accomplishments of the Teacher!
ai-tha-ap144:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap144:3.4_0: this is the fruit of a Shrine.
ai-tha-ap144:4.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap144:4.3_0: And the sixteen kings presented him.
ai-tha-ap144:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Saṅgāmajī.
ai-tha-ap144:7.1_0: The Lord of the World Uttarā
